text:
What are you doing to block DNS over HTTPS? 
MOD: We can move to NTSysAdmin if required. 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
 
E-mail:

instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday.

From: 'Shimon Kerzner' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 9, 2023 09:15
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Re: Do you look at update logs? 
A lot of our clients very strict outbound content filtering. I find looking at
the logs is a good way to ID exactly which URL they need to whitelist.
(Although, I know this information is published). 
Thanks,
Shimon
